title: CHECK COMPONENTS ALIGNMENT (PROD-LIKE) AND SANITY CHECKS BEFORE MIGRATION

task_list.instruction_title:
_- Deploy Last **PRODUCTION **PATCH FOR ALL APPLICATION IN SCOPE OF RUN/DR
 - - Check component alignment [Application to be in Iso Prod version + Hot fixes]

_- Sanity checks [Check Environment space & temporary database table space] before migration on **PROD LIKE ENVIRONMENT**
